scripts.build:css: npm run compile:css && npm run minify:css
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run clean:css
scripts.watch:css: npm run build:css && fswatch --recursive --follow-links -o css/scss | xargs -n1 -I{} npm run build:css
scripts.watch: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js
scripts.clean: npm run clean:css && npm run clean:js
